p: Kim et al. [ 147] used human endometriotic cells and reported that A. princeps leaf extract induced apoptosis in vitro. Pro-apoptotic mechanism consisted of the regulation of p38 and NF-kB pathways. In addition, A. princeps extracts inhibited the expression of Bcl-2, Bcl-xL, XIAP, caspase 3, caspase 8, and caspase 9 in a dose-dependent manner.
